remarks:
Specialization rule for restricted quantification, with two quantifiers.  (Contributed by NM, 20-Nov-1994.) 

---

 Specialization rule for restricted quantification.  (Contributed by NM, 20-Nov-1994.)
statement:
rspec2.1 $e |- A. x e. A A. y e. B ph $.
rspec2 $p |- ( ( x e. A /\ y e. B ) -> ph ) $.
